## Container.registerFactory() method

Registers a factory with the container for the specified key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerFactory<T extends Constructable>(key: T, factory: Factory<T>): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

key


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The key to register the factory under.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

factory


</td><td>

[Factory](../fast-element.factory/)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

The factory to register.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
